item.title: title: 从零开始:基础英语1
item.description: I want to see the world outside the walls.

item.title: title: English Quotes
item.description: Other men live to eat, while I eat to live.--Socrates

item.title: 编程之美笔记
item.description: 编程之美收集了约60道算法和程序设计题目。包括游戏之乐,数字之魅,结构之法,数学之趣。

item.title: Vim 常用操作总结
item.description: Vim 常用操作总结: 跳转,编辑,统计,折叠,宏等.

item.title: Vim Plugin
item.description: Vim is a text editor written by Bram Moolenaar and first released publicly in 1991. Based on the vi editor common to Unix-like systems, Vim is designedfor use both from a command line interface and as a standalone application in a graphical user interface.

item.title: Git简明手册
item.description: Git是一个由林纳斯·托瓦兹为了更好地管理linux内核开发而创立的分布式版本控制／软件配置管理软件。如今已经超越CVS、SVN称为主流的版本控制器。许多著名的开源项目都用Git管理。

item.title: Linux基础命令大全
item.description: Linux基础命令一览： 进程，时间，系统，文件文本，目录，shell，邮件，解压缩，网络，磁盘等命令。

item.title: title: 实例学HTML&&CSS
item.description: HyperText Markup Language (HTML) is the main markup language for displaying web pages and other information that can be displayed in a web browser.

item.title: 实例学xml
item.description: Extensible Markup Language (XML) is a markup language created to structure, store, and transport data by defining a set of rules for encoding documents in a format that is both human-readable and machine-readable.

item.title: 实例学Bash Shell
item.description: Bash is a Unix shell written by Brian Fox for the GNU Project as a free software replacement for the Bourne shell (sh).

item.title: 实例学C++
item.description: C++ is a statically typed, free-form, multi-paradigm, compiled, general-purpose programming language.

item.title: 实例学python
item.description: Python is a general-purpose, interpreted high-level programming language whose design philosophy emphasizes code readability.
